Articles.Content:
I am proud to introduce the Concept Test 2 Spaceplane. We don\'t discuss Concept Test 1. (Although it is attached)

It can make it to the Mun, and should be able to land and come back. I have made it to Munar orbit, was low on fuel so returned to Kerbin.

Here is Concept Test 2:

It uses the forward swept wing that I first saw on the F-64 Peregrine http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12899.msg198947#msg198947

It uses the Forward Swept wing from JellyCubes which can be found here - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0

EDIT: Added Spoiler tags.
